replies.body: i've been trying to buy it but it won't let me for unknown reasons, been trying for the past few days, is there a possible bug?
Do you already own the icon? It was also available last year so it's possible you got it then. If you did, you can equip it now to get the homeguard effect :)
Where do you actually purchase it? Can't find it anywhere
Someone told me that its 1 BE in the store?
